data: “Aye, it’s a bit dampish,” said Dixon, as he brought a couple more logs to replenish a fire that seemed to have no heart for burning.
"Aye, it's a bit dampish," said Dixon, as he brought a couple more logs to replenish a fire that seemed to have no heart for burning.
